type: Legendary Creature – Human Cleric Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Golden Dagger[/i] – Whenever you activate an ability of a creature you control, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
[i]Plenitude[/i] – {W}: Celica, Mila's Faithful gains lifelink until end of turn.
[i]Earth's Boon[/i] – {G}, Pay 2 life: Whenever a creature dealt damage by Celica this turn dies, create a Food token.
